quotes.message: Most people repent their sins by thanking God they ain't so wicked as their neighbors.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Repentance is the turning of the soul from the way of midnight to the point of the coming sun.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: If your repentance has not changed your life, you need to repent of your repentance
quotes.name: Steven J Lawson

quotes.message: To repent is to adopt God's viewpoint in place of your own.
quotes.name: William Temple

quotes.message: It's better to repent what you enjoyed than to repent not having enjoyed anything.
quotes.name: Giovanni Boccaccio

quotes.message: One can repent even of having repented.
quotes.name: Bernard Berenson

quotes.message: To properly prepare to receive personal revelation, we must repent, ask through prayer, be obedient, search the scriptures, fast, think pure thoughts, and develop a spirit of reverence.
quotes.name: L. Lionel Kendrick

quotes.message: Repentance, as we know, is basically not moaning and remorse, but turning and change.
quotes.name: J.I. Packer

quotes.message: Some often repent, yet never reform; they resemble a man traveling in a dangerous path, who frequently starts and stops, but never turns back.
quotes.name: Bonnell Thornton

quotes.message: Let us be quick to repent of injuries while repentance may not be a barren anguish.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: He comes never late who comes repentant.
quotes.name: Juan de Horozco

quotes.message: We will have to repent in this generation not merely for the vitriolic words and actions of the bad people, but for the appalling silence of the good people.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: And he repents in thorns that sleeps in beds of roses.
quotes.name: Francis Quarles

quotes.message: When you repent and operate on God's standards, now you have restoration and reconciliation.
quotes.name: Tony Evans

quotes.message: Confess yourself to heaven, Repent what's past, avoid what is to come, And do not spread the compost on the weeds To make them ranker.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: When we have heartily repented of a wrong, we should let all the waves of forgetfulness roll over it, and go forward unburdened to meet the future.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Repentance is another name for aspiration.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Be ashamed when you sin, not when you repent.
quotes.name: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.message: What you most repent of is a lasting sacrifice made under an impulse of good-nature. The goodness goes; the sacrifice sticks.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: We often repent of what we have said, but never, never, of that which we have not.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The one who never repents shall be the one who never sleeps.
quotes.name: Charles Lee

quotes.message: We often repent the good we have done as well as the ill.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: We seldom repent talking little, but very often talking too much.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: The invitation to repent is rarely a voice of chastisement but rather a loving appeal to turn around and to 're-turn'¬ù toward God.
quotes.name: Neil L. Andersen

quotes.message: He that does not repent, sins again.
quotes.name: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.message: Repentance is the vomit of the soul.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks

quotes.message: Yes, one can repent of moral transgression. The miracle of forgiveness is real, and true repentance is accepted of the Lord.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: Repentance is the word that gives us a second chance.
quotes.name: Fred A. Hartley

quotes.message: He who repents his sin and acknowledges it, is forgiven.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Grimm

quotes.message: Don't plan to repent at the 11th hour - you may die at 10:30.
quotes.name: Bo Jackson

quotes.message: It is better to repent a sin than regret the loss of a pleasure.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The most beautiful blessing we have been given is the chance to repent.
quotes.name: Islamic Proverb

quotes.message: The recognition of sin is the beginning of salvation.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Genuine repentance must bear the seal of a corrected life.
quotes.name: Lewis F. Korns

quotes.message: It is hard to repent, to admit you are wrong on faith alone before the evidence of a feeling of being forgiven and light comes.
quotes.name: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.message: It is a great deal easier to commit a second sin, than it was to commit the first; and a great deal harder to repent of a second, than it was to repent of the first.
quotes.name: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.message: It is better to act and repent, than not to act and regret.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: You cannot repent too soon, because you do not know how soon it may be too late.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: It's bad when you fail morally. It's worse when you don't repent.
quotes.name: Luis Palau

quotes.message: To repent of sin is as great a mark of grace as not to sin.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks

quotes.message: Repentant tears wash out the stain of guilt.
quotes.name: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.message: If you have behaved badly, repent, make what amends you can and address yourself to the task of behaving better next time
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: If we repent, God always recycles our mistakes.
quotes.name: Mark Batterson

quotes.message: We never repent of having eaten too little.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Some persons do first, think afterward, and then repent forever.
quotes.name: Thomas Secker

quotes.message: He who repents of having sinned is almost innocent.
quotes.name: Seneca The Younger

quotes.message: Repentance is accepted remorse.
quotes.name: Anne Sophie Swetchine
